Mary,

I just wanted to say good luck! That's great that you're doing this!

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 2003

Don't call the hotel yet, I'll let you know when they're ready to
take reservations. For now, just hold the weekend of April 20 open
for unschooling magic! And start hinting to the grandparents about
what a great holiday gift an Unschooling Conference would be for the
family. :o)
>
> Please pass this along to any lists or individuals that you feel
might be interested.
>
> --

> http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/

> green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling
truly
> alive."

messages.subject: Save the date!
messages.msgSnippet: Okay it s official, I signed the contracts this morning.  There WILL be a NW Unschooling Conference this Spring! What: L.I.F.E. is Good NW Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Okay it's official, I signed the contracts this morning. There WILL be a NW Unschooling Conference this Spring!

What: L.I.F.E. is Good NW Unschooling Conference
When: April 20-22, 2007
Where: Salbasgeon Suites Hotel, Corvallis, OR

I'll post the details and get the website up and running ASAP. Don't call the hotel yet, I'll let you know when they're ready to take reservations. For now, just hold the weekend of April 20 open for unschooling magic! And start hinting to the grandparents about what a great holiday gift an Unschooling Conference would be for the family. :o)

Please pass this along to any lists or individuals that you feel might be interested.

--
~Mary
http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh
